entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023
